alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Bourbon; Fayette; Harrison; Jessamine; Scott; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 11:53AM EDT until June 17 at 12:15PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 PM EDT FOR WOODFORD...SCOTT...EAST CENTRAL ANDERSON...NORTHEASTERN JESSAMINE...WESTERN BOURBON...FAYETTE AND SOUTHWESTERN HARRISON COUNTIES... At 1153 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Cynthiana to near Georgetown to near Versailles, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Paris, Cynthiana, Cadentown and Northland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Bourbon; Fayette; Harrison; Jessamine; Scott; Woodford
